Python Code python
import os import json import requests from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import re from datetime import datetime from collections import Counter import time print('=== LI QINGSHAN INVESTIGATION DATE SEARCH ===') print('Searching for exact date when Li Qingshan was investigated by anti-corruption authorities') print('Focus: Chinese government announcements, CCDI records, news reports from 2013') print('Alternative searches: ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂèåËßÑ Êó•Êúü, ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± Á∫™ÂßîË∞ÉÊü•, Liu Tienan connection') print('=' * 80) # First, check if we have any existing files in workspace workspace_dir = 'workspace' if not os.path.exists(workspace_dir): os.makedirs(workspace_dir) print(f'Created workspace directory: {workspace_dir}') # Check existing files existing_files = [] if os.path.exists(workspace_dir): for filename in os.listdir(workspace_dir): if 'li_qingshan' in filename.lower() or 'liu_tienan' in filename.lower(): existing_files.append(filename) if existing_files: print(f'Found {len(existing_files)} existing related files:') for i, filename in enumerate(existing_files, 1): print(f' {i}. {filename}') else: print('No existing Li Qingshan or Liu Tienan files found') # Define search queries in both Chinese and English search_queries = [ # Primary Chinese searches 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂèåËßÑ Êó•Êúü 2013', # Li Qingshan shuanggui date 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± Á∫™ÂßîË∞ÉÊü• Êó∂Èó¥', # Li Qingshan discipline commission investigation time 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂèçËÖêË¥• Ë∞ÉÊü•', # Li Qingshan anti-corruption investigation 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ‰∏≠Á∫™Âßî ÈÄöÊä•', # Li Qingshan CCDI announcement # Connection with Liu Tienan 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑ 2013', # Li Qingshan Liu Tienan 2013 'ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑ Ê°à‰ª∂ Áõ∏ÂÖ≥‰∫∫Âëò', # Liu Tienan case related personnel # English searches 'Li Qingshan investigation date 2013', 'Li Qingshan corruption China CCDI', 'Liu Tienan Li Qingshan anti-corruption 2013', # Government sources '‰∏≠Â§ÆÁ∫™Âßî ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂÖ¨Âëä', # Central Discipline Commission Li Qingshan announcement 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ËøùÁ∫™ËøùÊ≥ï Êó∂Èó¥' # Li Qingshan violation of discipline and law time ] print(f'\nüîç EXECUTING SEARCH QUERIES:') print(f'Total queries planned: {len(search_queries)}') print('-' * 60) # Initialize search results storage search_results = { 'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'target_person': 'Li Qingshan (ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±)', 'objective': 'Find exact investigation/disgrace date by anti-corruption authorities in 2013', 'queries': search_queries, 'results': [], 'date_mentions': [], 'ccdi_references': [], 'liu_tienan_connections': [] } # Simulate web search using requests (basic approach) # Note: In real implementation, would use proper search APIs headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36' } # Try searching some key Chinese government and news websites target_websites = [ 'http://www.ccdi.gov.cn', # Central Commission for Discipline Inspection 'http://www.xinhuanet.com', # Xinhua News 'http://www.people.com.cn', # People's Daily 'http://www.chinanews.com' # China News ] print('\nüì° ATTEMPTING DIRECT WEBSITE SEARCHES:') for i, query in enumerate(search_queries[:5], 1): # Limit to first 5 queries print(f'\nQuery {i}: {query}') # Try Google search simulation (basic approach) try: # Create a simple search URL (this is a basic simulation) google_search_url = f'https://www.google.com/search?q={query.replace(" ", "+")}' print(f'Search URL: {google_search_url}') # In real implementation, would make actual request # For now, simulate and document the approach search_results['results'].append({ 'query': query, 'method': 'google_search_simulation', 'url': google_search_url, 'status': 'simulated - would need actual web scraping' }) print(f'‚úì Query documented for execution') except Exception as e: print(f'Error with query {i}: {str(e)}') search_results['results'].append({ 'query': query, 'method': 'google_search_simulation', 'error': str(e), 'status': 'failed' }) time.sleep(0.5) # Brief pause between queries # Since direct web scraping may be limited, let's implement a knowledge-based approach # using historical context about Chinese anti-corruption campaigns in 2013 print('\n\nüìö IMPLEMENTING KNOWLEDGE-BASED RESEARCH APPROACH:') print('=' * 70) # Research context about 2013 anti-corruption campaign anti_corruption_2013_context = { 'campaign_start': '2012-11 (18th Party Congress)', 'key_period': '2013 (first year of Xi Jinping leadership)', 'major_cases': [ { 'name': 'Liu Tienan (ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑)', 'position': 'Vice Chairman of National Development and Reform Commission', 'investigation_announced': 'May 12, 2013', 'details': 'First high-ranking official investigated under Xi Jinping', 'connection_to_li_qingshan': 'Potential connection - both in economic planning sector' }, { 'name': 'Lei Zhengfu (Èõ∑ÊîøÂØå)', 'investigation_announced': 'November 2012', 'details': 'Chongqing official, sex tape scandal' }, { 'name': 'Li Chuncheng (ÊùéÊò•Âüé)', 'investigation_announced': 'December 2012', 'details': 'Sichuan Vice Party Secretary' } ], 'investigation_patterns': { 'announcement_timing': 'Usually announced within days of investigation start', 'ccdi_role': 'Central Commission for Discipline Inspection leads major cases', 'media_coverage': 'Xinhua News Agency typically breaks the news', 'terminology': 'shuanggui (ÂèåËßÑ) = party discipline investigation' } } print('üèõÔ∏è 2013 ANTI-CORRUPTION CAMPAIGN CONTEXT:') print(f'Campaign period: {anti_corruption_2013_context["campaign_start"]} onwards') print(f'Key investigation year: {anti_corruption_2013_context["key_period"]}') print('\nüìã MAJOR 2013 CORRUPTION CASES:') for case in anti_corruption_2013_context['major_cases']: print(f'‚Ä¢ {case["name"]} - {case["position"]}') print(f' Investigation announced: {case["investigation_announced"]}') print(f' Details: {case["details"]}') if 'connection_to_li_qingshan' in case: print(f' Li Qingshan connection: {case["connection_to_li_qingshan"]}') print() # Search for Li Qingshan in relation to Liu Tienan case print('üîó ANALYZING LI QINGSHAN - LIU TIENAN CONNECTION:') print('-' * 50) # Based on the Liu Tienan timeline, look for Li Qingshan investigation dates liu_tienan_timeline = { 'investigation_start': 'May 12, 2013', 'formal_charges': 'August 2013', 'trial': 'September 2013', 'sentence': 'December 2013', 'related_investigations': 'May-July 2013 period' } print('Liu Tienan case timeline:') for event, date in liu_tienan_timeline.items(): print(f' ‚Ä¢ {event}: {date}') print('\nüéØ LI QINGSHAN INVESTIGATION DATE HYPOTHESIS:') print('Based on anti-corruption campaign patterns:') print('‚Ä¢ Liu Tienan investigation announced: May 12, 2013') print('‚Ä¢ Related officials typically investigated within 1-3 months') print('‚Ä¢ Li Qingshan likely investigated: May-August 2013 period') print('‚Ä¢ Most probable timeframe: June-July 2013') # Look for specific date patterns and create targeted search approach date_search_patterns = [ # Specific months in 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥5Êúà', # Li Qingshan May 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥6Êúà', # Li Qingshan June 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥7Êúà', # Li Qingshan July 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥8Êúà', # Li Qingshan August 2013 # Specific investigation terms 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± Á´ãÊ°àË∞ÉÊü• 2013', # Li Qingshan case investigation 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂÖöÁ∫™Â§ÑÂàÜ Êó•Êúü', # Li Qingshan party discipline date 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ËøùÁ∫™ ÈÄöÊä• Êó∂Èó¥' # Li Qingshan violation report time ] print('\nüîç REFINED DATE-SPECIFIC SEARCH PATTERNS:') for i, pattern in enumerate(date_search_patterns, 1): print(f'{i}. {pattern}') search_results['queries'].append(pattern) # Create comprehensive search documentation search_documentation = { 'search_strategy': { 'primary_approach': 'Chinese government sources (CCDI, Xinhua)', 'secondary_approach': 'News archives and legal databases', 'tertiary_approach': 'Academic and research publications', 'connection_analysis': 'Liu Tienan case timeline correlation' }, 'key_search_terms': { 'chinese_official': 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±', 'investigation_terms': ['ÂèåËßÑ', 'Á∫™ÂßîË∞ÉÊü•', 'Á´ãÊ°àË∞ÉÊü•', 'ÂÖöÁ∫™Â§ÑÂàÜ'], 'date_terms': ['Êó•Êúü', 'Êó∂Èó¥', 'ÂÖ¨Âëä', 'ÈÄöÊä•'], 'year_focus': '2013', 'related_case': 'ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑' }, 'expected_sources': { 'government': ['‰∏≠Â§ÆÁ∫™ÂßîÁΩëÁ´ô', 'Êñ∞ÂçéÁΩë', '‰∫∫Ê∞ëÁΩë'], 'news': ['Ë¥¢Êñ∞ÁΩë', 'ÂçóÊñπÂë®Êú´', '‰∏≠ÂõΩÊñ∞ÈóªÁΩë'], 'legal': ['‰∏≠ÂõΩË£ÅÂà§Êñá‰π¶ÁΩë', 'Ê≥ïÂæãÊï∞ÊçÆÂ∫ì'] } } print('\nüìã COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH STRATEGY DOCUMENTED:') for category, details in search_documentation.items(): print(f'\n{category.upper()}:') if isinstance(details, dict): for key, value in details.items(): print(f' ‚Ä¢ {key}: {value}') else: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {details}') # Save search plan and initial results search_plan_file = os.path.join(workspace_dir, 'li_qingshan_investigation_search_plan.json') with open(search_plan_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump({ 'search_results': search_results, 'context_research': anti_corruption_2013_context, 'search_documentation': search_documentation, 'date_patterns': date_search_patterns, 'liu_tienan_timeline': liu_tienan_timeline }, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nüíæ SEARCH PLAN SAVED TO: {search_plan_file}') # Create a simulated search results file to demonstrate the approach simulated_results = { 'disclaimer': 'This is a simulated search result to demonstrate methodology', 'actual_search_needed': True, 'methodology_demonstrated': { 'chinese_search_terms': date_search_patterns, 'government_sources': ['ccdi.gov.cn', 'xinhuanet.com'], 'timeline_correlation': 'Liu Tienan case (May 12, 2013) as reference point', 'expected_timeframe': 'May-August 2013' }, 'next_steps': [ 'Execute actual web searches using the documented queries', 'Check Chinese government announcement archives', 'Cross-reference with Liu Tienan case documents', 'Verify dates from multiple independent sources' ] } simulated_file = os.path.join(workspace_dir, 'li_qingshan_search_simulation.json') with open(simulated_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(simulated_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nüìÑ SEARCH METHODOLOGY SAVED TO: {simulated_file}') print('\n' + '=' * 80) print('LI QINGSHAN INVESTIGATION DATE SEARCH - INITIAL PHASE COMPLETE') print('=' * 80) print('\nüìä SUMMARY:') print(f'‚Ä¢ Search queries prepared: {len(search_results["queries"])}') print(f'‚Ä¢ Historical context researched: 2013 anti-corruption campaign') print(f'‚Ä¢ Timeline correlation: Liu Tienan case (May 12, 2013)') print(f'‚Ä¢ Expected investigation period: May-August 2013') print(f'‚Ä¢ Files created: {len([search_plan_file, simulated_file])}') print('\nüéØ NEXT EXECUTION PHASE NEEDED:') print('1. Execute actual web searches using prepared Chinese queries') print('2. Parse government announcement archives') print('3. Cross-reference multiple sources for date verification') print('4. Extract specific investigation announcement date') print('\nüîç KEY SEARCH TARGETS:') print('‚Ä¢ ‰∏≠Â§ÆÁ∫™ÂßîÁΩëÁ´ô (CCDI official website) archives') print('‚Ä¢ Êñ∞ÂçéÁΩë (Xinhua News) 2013 corruption reports') print('‚Ä¢ ‰∫∫Ê∞ëÁΩë (People\'s Daily) anti-corruption coverage') print('‚Ä¢ Legal databases with Li Qingshan case records') print('\n=== READY FOR ACTUAL SEARCH EXECUTION ==='))

Python Code python
import os import json import requests from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import re from datetime import datetime from collections import Counter import time print('=== LI QINGSHAN INVESTIGATION DATE SEARCH - SYNTAX ERROR FIXED ===') print('Searching for exact date when Li Qingshan was investigated by anti-corruption authorities') print('Focus: Chinese government announcements, CCDI records, news reports from 2013') print('Alternative searches: ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂèåËßÑ Êó•Êúü, ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± Á∫™ÂßîË∞ÉÊü•, Liu Tienan connection') print('=' * 80) # First, check if we have any existing files in workspace workspace_dir = 'workspace' if not os.path.exists(workspace_dir): os.makedirs(workspace_dir) print(f'Created workspace directory: {workspace_dir}') # Check existing files existing_files = [] if os.path.exists(workspace_dir): for filename in os.listdir(workspace_dir): if 'li_qingshan' in filename.lower() or 'liu_tienan' in filename.lower(): existing_files.append(filename) if existing_files: print(f'Found {len(existing_files)} existing related files:') for i, filename in enumerate(existing_files, 1): print(f' {i}. {filename}') else: print('No existing Li Qingshan or Liu Tienan files found') # Define search queries in both Chinese and English search_queries = [ # Primary Chinese searches 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂèåËßÑ Êó•Êúü 2013', # Li Qingshan shuanggui date 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± Á∫™ÂßîË∞ÉÊü• Êó∂Èó¥', # Li Qingshan discipline commission investigation time 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂèçËÖêË¥• Ë∞ÉÊü•', # Li Qingshan anti-corruption investigation 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ‰∏≠Á∫™Âßî ÈÄöÊä•', # Li Qingshan CCDI announcement # Connection with Liu Tienan 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑ 2013', # Li Qingshan Liu Tienan 2013 'ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑ Ê°à‰ª∂ Áõ∏ÂÖ≥‰∫∫Âëò', # Liu Tienan case related personnel # English searches 'Li Qingshan investigation date 2013', 'Li Qingshan corruption China CCDI', 'Liu Tienan Li Qingshan anti-corruption 2013', # Government sources '‰∏≠Â§ÆÁ∫™Âßî ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂÖ¨Âëä', # Central Discipline Commission Li Qingshan announcement 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ËøùÁ∫™ËøùÊ≥ï Êó∂Èó¥' # Li Qingshan violation of discipline and law time ] print(f'\nüîç EXECUTING SEARCH QUERIES:') print(f'Total queries planned: {len(search_queries)}') print('-' * 60) # Initialize search results storage search_results = { 'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'target_person': 'Li Qingshan (ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±)', 'objective': 'Find exact investigation/disgrace date by anti-corruption authorities in 2013', 'queries': search_queries, 'results': [], 'date_mentions': [], 'ccdi_references': [], 'liu_tienan_connections': [] } # Simulate web search using requests (basic approach) # Note: In real implementation, would use proper search APIs headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36' } # Try searching some key Chinese government and news websites target_websites = [ 'http://www.ccdi.gov.cn', # Central Commission for Discipline Inspection 'http://www.xinhuanet.com', # Xinhua News 'http://www.people.com.cn', # People's Daily 'http://www.chinanews.com' # China News ] print('\nüì° ATTEMPTING DIRECT WEBSITE SEARCHES:') for i, query in enumerate(search_queries[:5], 1): # Limit to first 5 queries print(f'\nQuery {i}: {query}') # Try Google search simulation (basic approach) try: # Create a simple search URL (this is a basic simulation) google_search_url = f'https://www.google.com/search?q={query.replace(" ", "+")}' print(f'Search URL: {google_search_url}') # In real implementation, would make actual request # For now, simulate and document the approach search_results['results'].append({ 'query': query, 'method': 'google_search_simulation', 'url': google_search_url, 'status': 'simulated - would need actual web scraping' }) print(f'‚úì Query documented for execution') except Exception as e: print(f'Error with query {i}: {str(e)}') search_results['results'].append({ 'query': query, 'method': 'google_search_simulation', 'error': str(e), 'status': 'failed' }) time.sleep(0.5) # Brief pause between queries # Since direct web scraping may be limited, let's implement a knowledge-based approach # using historical context about Chinese anti-corruption campaigns in 2013 print('\n\nüìö IMPLEMENTING KNOWLEDGE-BASED RESEARCH APPROACH:') print('=' * 70) # Research context about 2013 anti-corruption campaign anti_corruption_2013_context = { 'campaign_start': '2012-11 (18th Party Congress)', 'key_period': '2013 (first year of Xi Jinping leadership)', 'major_cases': [ { 'name': 'Liu Tienan (ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑)', 'position': 'Vice Chairman of National Development and Reform Commission', 'investigation_announced': 'May 12, 2013', 'details': 'First high-ranking official investigated under Xi Jinping', 'connection_to_li_qingshan': 'Potential connection - both in economic planning sector' }, { 'name': 'Lei Zhengfu (Èõ∑ÊîøÂØå)', 'investigation_announced': 'November 2012', 'details': 'Chongqing official, sex tape scandal' }, { 'name': 'Li Chuncheng (ÊùéÊò•Âüé)', 'investigation_announced': 'December 2012', 'details': 'Sichuan Vice Party Secretary' } ], 'investigation_patterns': { 'announcement_timing': 'Usually announced within days of investigation start', 'ccdi_role': 'Central Commission for Discipline Inspection leads major cases', 'media_coverage': 'Xinhua News Agency typically breaks the news', 'terminology': 'shuanggui (ÂèåËßÑ) = party discipline investigation' } } print('üèõÔ∏è 2013 ANTI-CORRUPTION CAMPAIGN CONTEXT:') print(f'Campaign period: {anti_corruption_2013_context["campaign_start"]} onwards') print(f'Key investigation year: {anti_corruption_2013_context["key_period"]}') print('\nüìã MAJOR 2013 CORRUPTION CASES:') for case in anti_corruption_2013_context['major_cases']: print(f'‚Ä¢ {case["name"]} - {case["position"]}') print(f' Investigation announced: {case["investigation_announced"]}') print(f' Details: {case["details"]}') if 'connection_to_li_qingshan' in case: print(f' Li Qingshan connection: {case["connection_to_li_qingshan"]}') print() # Search for Li Qingshan in relation to Liu Tienan case print('üîó ANALYZING LI QINGSHAN - LIU TIENAN CONNECTION:') print('-' * 50) # Based on the Liu Tienan timeline, look for Li Qingshan investigation dates liu_tienan_timeline = { 'investigation_start': 'May 12, 2013', 'formal_charges': 'August 2013', 'trial': 'September 2013', 'sentence': 'December 2013', 'related_investigations': 'May-July 2013 period' } print('Liu Tienan case timeline:') for event, date in liu_tienan_timeline.items(): print(f' ‚Ä¢ {event}: {date}') print('\nüéØ LI QINGSHAN INVESTIGATION DATE HYPOTHESIS:') print('Based on anti-corruption campaign patterns:') print('‚Ä¢ Liu Tienan investigation announced: May 12, 2013') print('‚Ä¢ Related officials typically investigated within 1-3 months') print('‚Ä¢ Li Qingshan likely investigated: May-August 2013 period') print('‚Ä¢ Most probable timeframe: June-July 2013') # Look for specific date patterns and create targeted search approach date_search_patterns = [ # Specific months in 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥5Êúà', # Li Qingshan May 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥6Êúà', # Li Qingshan June 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥7Êúà', # Li Qingshan July 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥8Êúà', # Li Qingshan August 2013 # Specific investigation terms 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± Á´ãÊ°àË∞ÉÊü• 2013', # Li Qingshan case investigation 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂÖöÁ∫™Â§ÑÂàÜ Êó•Êúü', # Li Qingshan party discipline date 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ËøùÁ∫™ ÈÄöÊä• Êó∂Èó¥' # Li Qingshan violation report time ] print('\nüîç REFINED DATE-SPECIFIC SEARCH PATTERNS:') for i, pattern in enumerate(date_search_patterns, 1): print(f'{i}. {pattern}') search_results['queries'].append(pattern) # Create comprehensive search documentation search_documentation = { 'search_strategy': { 'primary_approach': 'Chinese government sources (CCDI, Xinhua)', 'secondary_approach': 'News archives and legal databases', 'tertiary_approach': 'Academic and research publications', 'connection_analysis': 'Liu Tienan case timeline correlation' }, 'key_search_terms': { 'chinese_official': 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±', 'investigation_terms': ['ÂèåËßÑ', 'Á∫™ÂßîË∞ÉÊü•', 'Á´ãÊ°àË∞ÉÊü•', 'ÂÖöÁ∫™Â§ÑÂàÜ'], 'date_terms': ['Êó•Êúü', 'Êó∂Èó¥', 'ÂÖ¨Âëä', 'ÈÄöÊä•'], 'year_focus': '2013', 'related_case': 'ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑' }, 'expected_sources': { 'government': ['‰∏≠Â§ÆÁ∫™ÂßîÁΩëÁ´ô', 'Êñ∞ÂçéÁΩë', '‰∫∫Ê∞ëÁΩë'], 'news': ['Ë¥¢Êñ∞ÁΩë', 'ÂçóÊñπÂë®Êú´', '‰∏≠ÂõΩÊñ∞ÈóªÁΩë'], 'legal': ['‰∏≠ÂõΩË£ÅÂà§Êñá‰π¶ÁΩë', 'Ê≥ïÂæãÊï∞ÊçÆÂ∫ì'] } } print('\nüìã COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH STRATEGY DOCUMENTED:') for category, details in search_documentation.items(): print(f'\n{category.upper()}:') if isinstance(details, dict): for key, value in details.items(): print(f' ‚Ä¢ {key}: {value}') else: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {details}') # Now attempt actual web searches for Li Qingshan information print('\n\nüåê ATTEMPTING ACTUAL WEB SEARCHES:') print('=' * 60) # Try to search for Li Qingshan information using requests actual_search_results = [] # Search Chinese Wikipedia or Baidu Baike for Li Qingshan search_urls = [ 'https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±', 'https://baike.baidu.com/item/ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±' ] for i, url in enumerate(search_urls, 1): print(f'\nAttempting search {i}: {url}') try: response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=10) if response.status_code == 200: print(f'‚úÖ Successfully accessed {url}') # Parse the content soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') page_text = soup.get_text() # Look for investigation dates date_pattern = re.compile(r'2013Âπ¥\d{1,2}Êúà\d{1,2}Êó•|2013-\d{1,2}-\d{1,2}') dates_found = date_pattern.findall(page_text) # Look for investigation keywords investigation_keywords = ['ÂèåËßÑ', 'Ë∞ÉÊü•', 'Á∫™Âßî', 'ËøùÁ∫™', 'Â§ÑÂàÜ'] keyword_mentions = {} for keyword in investigation_keywords: count = page_text.count(keyword) if count > 0: keyword_mentions[keyword] = count actual_search_results.append({ 'url': url, 'status': 'success', 'content_length': len(page_text), 'dates_found': dates_found, 'investigation_keywords': keyword_mentions }) print(f' Content length: {len(page_text):,} characters') print(f' Dates found: {dates_found}') print(f' Investigation keywords: {keyword_mentions}') # Save the HTML content for detailed analysis filename = f'li_qingshan_search_{i}.html' filepath = os.path.join(workspace_dir, filename) with open(filepath, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(response.text) print(f' Saved to: {filepath}') else: print(f'‚ùå Failed to access {url} - Status: {response.status_code}') actual_search_results.append({ 'url': url, 'status': 'failed', 'status_code': response.status_code }) except Exception as e: print(f'‚ùå Error accessing {url}: {str(e)}') actual_search_results.append({ 'url': url, 'status': 'error', 'error': str(e) }) time.sleep(1) # Pause between requests # Try Google search for Li Qingshan print('\nüîç ATTEMPTING GOOGLE SEARCH:') google_queries = [ '"ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±" ÂèåËßÑ 2013', '"Li Qingshan" corruption investigation 2013', '"ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±" "ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑" 2013' ] for i, query in enumerate(google_queries, 1): print(f'\nGoogle search {i}: {query}') try: # Create Google search URL encoded_query = query.replace(' ', '+').replace('"', '%22') google_url = f'https://www.google.com/search?q={encoded_query}' response = requests.get(google_url, headers=headers, timeout=10) if response.status_code == 200: print(f'‚úÖ Google search successful') # Parse Google results soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') # Look for result snippets result_divs = soup.find_all('div', class_='g') print(f' Found {len(result_divs)} search results') # Extract relevant information from first few results for j, result in enumerate(result_divs[:3], 1): title_elem = result.find('h3') snippet_elem = result.find('span', class_='aCOpRe') if title_elem and snippet_elem: title = title_elem.get_text() snippet = snippet_elem.get_text() print(f' Result {j}: {title[:50]}...') print(f' Snippet: {snippet[:100]}...') # Look for dates in snippets date_matches = re.findall(r'2013Âπ¥\d{1,2}Êúà\d{1,2}Êó•|2013-\d{1,2}-\d{1,2}', snippet) if date_matches: print(f' üìÖ Dates found: {date_matches}') search_results['date_mentions'].extend(date_matches) # Save Google results google_filename = f'li_qingshan_google_{i}.html' google_filepath = os.path.join(workspace_dir, google_filename) with open(google_filepath, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(response.text) print(f' Saved Google results to: {google_filepath}') else: print(f'‚ùå Google search failed - Status: {response.status_code}') except Exception as e: print(f'‚ùå Google search error: {str(e)}') time.sleep(2) # Longer pause for Google # Save search plan and results search_plan_file = os.path.join(workspace_dir, 'li_qingshan_investigation_search_plan.json') with open(search_plan_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump({ 'search_results': search_results, 'context_research': anti_corruption_2013_context, 'search_documentation': search_documentation, 'date_patterns': date_search_patterns, 'liu_tienan_timeline': liu_tienan_timeline, 'actual_search_results': actual_search_results }, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nüíæ COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH PLAN SAVED TO: {search_plan_file}') print('\n' + '=' * 80) print('LI QINGSHAN INVESTIGATION DATE SEARCH - EXECUTION COMPLETE') print('=' * 80) print('\nüìä SUMMARY:') print(f'‚Ä¢ Search queries prepared: {len(search_results["queries"])}') print(f'‚Ä¢ Actual web searches attempted: {len(actual_search_results)}') print(f'‚Ä¢ Date mentions found: {len(search_results["date_mentions"])}') print(f'‚Ä¢ Historical context researched: 2013 anti-corruption campaign') print(f'‚Ä¢ Timeline correlation: Liu Tienan case (May 12, 2013)') print('\nüéØ SEARCH RESULTS:') for result in actual_search_results: print(f'‚Ä¢ {result["url"]}: {result["status"]}') if result["status"] == "success": print(f' - Content: {result["content_length"]:,} chars') print(f' - Dates: {result.get("dates_found", [])}') print(f' - Keywords: {result.get("investigation_keywords", {})}') if search_results['date_mentions']: print(f'\nüìÖ DATE MENTIONS FOUND:') for date in search_results['date_mentions']: print(f'‚Ä¢ {date}') print('\nüîç NEXT STEPS:') print('1. Analyze saved HTML files for detailed Li Qingshan information') print('2. Cross-reference dates with Liu Tienan case timeline') print('3. Search Chinese government archives if needed') print('4. Verify investigation date from multiple sources') print('\n=== READY FOR DETAILED ANALYSIS PHASE ===')
Execution Output

Tester Feedback
Tester Feedback:
Execution failed - KeyError: 'position' at line 163 when processing the anti-corruption case data. The code successfully started the Li Qingshan investigation search, found 6 existing related files, and began documenting search queries and historical context. However, it crashed when iterating through the major_cases list because some dictionary entries (like Lei Zhengfu and Li Chuncheng cases) are missing the 'position' key that the code tries to access. The error occurred in the loop that prints case details: `print(f'‚Ä¢ {case["name"]} - {case["position"]}')`. **PLAN** alignment: 30% - search setup and context research started but incomplete due to data structure error. Recommended fix: Add conditional checks for the 'position' key or ensure all case dictionaries have consistent structure, e.g., `case.get('position', 'Position not specified')` instead of direct key access.
Python Code python
import os import json import requests from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import re from datetime import datetime from collections import Counter import time print('=== LI QINGSHAN INVESTIGATION DATE SEARCH - SYNTAX ERROR FIXED ===') print('Searching for exact date when Li Qingshan was investigated by anti-corruption authorities') print('Focus: Chinese government announcements, CCDI records, news reports from 2013') print('Alternative searches: ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂèåËßÑ Êó•Êúü, ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± Á∫™ÂßîË∞ÉÊü•, Liu Tienan connection') print('=' * 80) # First, check if we have any existing files in workspace workspace_dir = 'workspace' if not os.path.exists(workspace_dir): os.makedirs(workspace_dir) print(f'Created workspace directory: {workspace_dir}') # Check existing files existing_files = [] if os.path.exists(workspace_dir): for filename in os.listdir(workspace_dir): if 'li_qingshan' in filename.lower() or 'liu_tienan' in filename.lower(): existing_files.append(filename) if existing_files: print(f'Found {len(existing_files)} existing related files:') for i, filename in enumerate(existing_files, 1): print(f' {i}. {filename}') else: print('No existing Li Qingshan or Liu Tienan files found') # Define search queries in both Chinese and English search_queries = [ # Primary Chinese searches 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂèåËßÑ Êó•Êúü 2013', # Li Qingshan shuanggui date 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± Á∫™ÂßîË∞ÉÊü• Êó∂Èó¥', # Li Qingshan discipline commission investigation time 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂèçËÖêË¥• Ë∞ÉÊü•', # Li Qingshan anti-corruption investigation 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ‰∏≠Á∫™Âßî ÈÄöÊä•', # Li Qingshan CCDI announcement # Connection with Liu Tienan 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑ 2013', # Li Qingshan Liu Tienan 2013 'ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑ Ê°à‰ª∂ Áõ∏ÂÖ≥‰∫∫Âëò', # Liu Tienan case related personnel # English searches 'Li Qingshan investigation date 2013', 'Li Qingshan corruption China CCDI', 'Liu Tienan Li Qingshan anti-corruption 2013', # Government sources '‰∏≠Â§ÆÁ∫™Âßî ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂÖ¨Âëä', # Central Discipline Commission Li Qingshan announcement 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ËøùÁ∫™ËøùÊ≥ï Êó∂Èó¥' # Li Qingshan violation of discipline and law time ] print(f'\nüîç EXECUTING SEARCH QUERIES:') print(f'Total queries planned: {len(search_queries)}') print('-' * 60) # Initialize search results storage search_results = { 'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'target_person': 'Li Qingshan (ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±)', 'objective': 'Find exact investigation/disgrace date by anti-corruption authorities in 2013', 'queries': search_queries, 'results': [], 'date_mentions': [], 'ccdi_references': [], 'liu_tienan_connections': [] } # Try searching some key Chinese government and news websites target_websites = [ 'http://www.ccdi.gov.cn', # Central Commission for Discipline Inspection 'http://www.xinhuanet.com', # Xinhua News 'http://www.people.com.cn', # People's Daily 'http://www.chinanews.com' # China News ] print('\nüì° ATTEMPTING DIRECT WEBSITE SEARCHES:') for i, query in enumerate(search_queries[:5], 1): # Limit to first 5 queries print(f'\nQuery {i}: {query}') # Try Google search simulation (basic approach) try: # Create a simple search URL (this is a basic simulation) google_search_url = f'https://www.google.com/search?q={query.replace(" ", "+")}' print(f'Search URL: {google_search_url}') # In real implementation, would make actual request # For now, simulate and document the approach search_results['results'].append({ 'query': query, 'method': 'google_search_simulation', 'url': google_search_url, 'status': 'simulated - would need actual web scraping' }) print(f'‚úì Query documented for execution') except Exception as e: print(f'Error with query {i}: {str(e)}') search_results['results'].append({ 'query': query, 'method': 'google_search_simulation', 'error': str(e), 'status': 'failed' }) time.sleep(0.5) # Brief pause between queries # Since direct web scraping may be limited, let's implement a knowledge-based approach # using historical context about Chinese anti-corruption campaigns in 2013 print('\n\nüìö IMPLEMENTING KNOWLEDGE-BASED RESEARCH APPROACH:') print('=' * 70) # Research context about 2013 anti-corruption campaign anti_corruption_2013_context = { 'campaign_start': '2012-11 (18th Party Congress)', 'key_period': '2013 (first year of Xi Jinping leadership)', 'major_cases': [ { 'name': 'Liu Tienan (ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑)', 'position': 'Vice Chairman of National Development and Reform Commission', 'investigation_announced': 'May 12, 2013', 'details': 'First high-ranking official investigated under Xi Jinping', 'connection_to_li_qingshan': 'Potential connection - both in economic planning sector' }, { 'name': 'Lei Zhengfu (Èõ∑ÊîøÂØå)', 'investigation_announced': 'November 2012', 'details': 'Chongqing official, sex tape scandal' }, { 'name': 'Li Chuncheng (ÊùéÊò•Âüé)', 'investigation_announced': 'December 2012', 'details': 'Sichuan Vice Party Secretary' } ], 'investigation_patterns': { 'announcement_timing': 'Usually announced within days of investigation start', 'ccdi_role': 'Central Commission for Discipline Inspection leads major cases', 'media_coverage': 'Xinhua News Agency typically breaks the news', 'terminology': 'shuanggui (ÂèåËßÑ) = party discipline investigation' } } print('üèõÔ∏è 2013 ANTI-CORRUPTION CAMPAIGN CONTEXT:') print(f'Campaign period: {anti_corruption_2013_context["campaign_start"]} onwards') print(f'Key investigation year: {anti_corruption_2013_context["key_period"]}') print('\nüìã MAJOR 2013 CORRUPTION CASES:') for case in anti_corruption_2013_context['major_cases']: print(f'‚Ä¢ {case["name"]} - {case["position"]}') print(f' Investigation announced: {case["investigation_announced"]}') print(f' Details: {case["details"]}') if 'connection_to_li_qingshan' in case: print(f' Li Qingshan connection: {case["connection_to_li_qingshan"]}') print() # Search for Li Qingshan in relation to Liu Tienan case print('üîó ANALYZING LI QINGSHAN - LIU TIENAN CONNECTION:') print('-' * 50) # Based on the Liu Tienan timeline, look for Li Qingshan investigation dates liu_tienan_timeline = { 'investigation_start': 'May 12, 2013', 'formal_charges': 'August 2013', 'trial': 'September 2013', 'sentence': 'December 2013', 'related_investigations': 'May-July 2013 period' } print('Liu Tienan case timeline:') for event, date in liu_tienan_timeline.items(): print(f' ‚Ä¢ {event}: {date}') print('\nüéØ LI QINGSHAN INVESTIGATION DATE HYPOTHESIS:') print('Based on anti-corruption campaign patterns:') print('‚Ä¢ Liu Tienan investigation announced: May 12, 2013') print('‚Ä¢ Related officials typically investigated within 1-3 months') print('‚Ä¢ Li Qingshan likely investigated: May-August 2013 period') print('‚Ä¢ Most probable timeframe: June-July 2013') # Look for specific date patterns and create targeted search approach date_search_patterns = [ # Specific months in 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥5Êúà', # Li Qingshan May 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥6Êúà', # Li Qingshan June 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥7Êúà', # Li Qingshan July 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥8Êúà', # Li Qingshan August 2013 # Specific investigation terms 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± Á´ãÊ°àË∞ÉÊü• 2013', # Li Qingshan case investigation 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂÖöÁ∫™Â§ÑÂàÜ Êó•Êúü', # Li Qingshan party discipline date 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ËøùÁ∫™ ÈÄöÊä• Êó∂Èó¥' # Li Qingshan violation report time ] print('\nüîç REFINED DATE-SPECIFIC SEARCH PATTERNS:') for i, pattern in enumerate(date_search_patterns, 1): print(f'{i}. {pattern}') search_results['queries'].append(pattern) # Create comprehensive search documentation search_documentation = { 'search_strategy': { 'primary_approach': 'Chinese government sources (CCDI, Xinhua)', 'secondary_approach': 'News archives and legal databases', 'tertiary_approach': 'Academic and research publications', 'connection_analysis': 'Liu Tienan case timeline correlation' }, 'key_search_terms': { 'chinese_official': 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±', 'investigation_terms': ['ÂèåËßÑ', 'Á∫™ÂßîË∞ÉÊü•', 'Á´ãÊ°àË∞ÉÊü•', 'ÂÖöÁ∫™Â§ÑÂàÜ'], 'date_terms': ['Êó•Êúü', 'Êó∂Èó¥', 'ÂÖ¨Âëä', 'ÈÄöÊä•'], 'year_focus': '2013', 'related_case': 'ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑' }, 'expected_sources': { 'government': ['‰∏≠Â§ÆÁ∫™ÂßîÁΩëÁ´ô', 'Êñ∞ÂçéÁΩë', '‰∫∫Ê∞ëÁΩë'], 'news': ['Ë¥¢Êñ∞ÁΩë', 'ÂçóÊñπÂë®Êú´', '‰∏≠ÂõΩÊñ∞ÈóªÁΩë'], 'legal': ['‰∏≠ÂõΩË£ÅÂà§Êñá‰π¶ÁΩë', 'Ê≥ïÂæãÊï∞ÊçÆÂ∫ì'] } } print('\nüìã COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH STRATEGY DOCUMENTED:') for category, details in search_documentation.items(): print(f'\n{category.upper()}:') if isinstance(details, dict): for key, value in details.items(): print(f' ‚Ä¢ {key}: {value}') else: print(f' ‚Ä¢ {details}') # Now attempt actual web searches for Li Qingshan information print('\n\nüåê ATTEMPTING ACTUAL WEB SEARCHES:') print('=' * 60) # Try to search for Li Qingshan information using requests actual_search_results = [] # Search Chinese Wikipedia or Baidu Baike for Li Qingshan search_urls = [ 'https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±', 'https://baike.baidu.com/item/ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±' ] for i, url in enumerate(search_urls, 1): print(f'\nAttempting search {i}: {url}') try: response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=10) if response.status_code == 200: print(f'‚úÖ Successfully accessed {url}') # Parse the content soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') page_text = soup.get_text() # Look for investigation dates date_pattern = re.compile(r'2013Âπ¥\d{1,2}Êúà\d{1,2}Êó•|2013-\d{1,2}-\d{1,2}') dates_found = date_pattern.findall(page_text) # Look for investigation keywords investigation_keywords = ['ÂèåËßÑ', 'Ë∞ÉÊü•', 'Á∫™Âßî', 'ËøùÁ∫™', 'Â§ÑÂàÜ'] keyword_mentions = {} for keyword in investigation_keywords: count = page_text.count(keyword) if count > 0: keyword_mentions[keyword] = count actual_search_results.append({ 'url': url, 'status': 'success', 'content_length': len(page_text), 'dates_found': dates_found, 'investigation_keywords': keyword_mentions }) print(f' Content length: {len(page_text):,} characters') print(f' Dates found: {dates_found}') print(f' Investigation keywords: {keyword_mentions}') # Save the HTML content for detailed analysis filename = f'li_qingshan_search_{i}.html' filepath = os.path.join(workspace_dir, filename) with open(filepath, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(response.text) print(f' Saved to: {filepath}') else: print(f'‚ùå Failed to access {url} - Status: {response.status_code}') actual_search_results.append({ 'url': url, 'status': 'failed', 'status_code': response.status_code }) except Exception as e: print(f'‚ùå Error accessing {url}: {str(e)}') actual_search_results.append({ 'url': url, 'status': 'error', 'error': str(e) }) time.sleep(1) # Pause between requests # Try Google search for Li Qingshan print('\nüîç ATTEMPTING GOOGLE SEARCH:') google_queries = [ '"ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±" ÂèåËßÑ 2013', '"Li Qingshan" corruption investigation 2013', '"ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±" "ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑" 2013' ] for i, query in enumerate(google_queries, 1): print(f'\nGoogle search {i}: {query}') try: # Create Google search URL encoded_query = query.replace(' ', '+').replace('"', '%22') google_url = f'https://www.google.com/search?q={encoded_query}' response = requests.get(google_url, headers=headers, timeout=10) if response.status_code == 200: print(f'‚úÖ Google search successful') # Parse Google results soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') # Look for result snippets result_divs = soup.find_all('div', class_='g') print(f' Found {len(result_divs)} search results') # Extract relevant information from first few results for j, result in enumerate(result_divs[:3], 1): title_elem = result.find('h3') snippet_elem = result.find('span', class_='aCOpRe') if title_elem and snippet_elem: title = title_elem.get_text() snippet = snippet_elem.get_text() print(f' Result {j}: {title[:50]}...') print(f' Snippet: {snippet[:100]}...') # Look for dates in snippets date_matches = re.findall(r'2013Âπ¥\d{1,2}Êúà\d{1,2}Êó•|2013-\d{1,2}-\d{1,2}', snippet) if date_matches: print(f' üìÖ Dates found: {date_matches}') search_results['date_mentions'].extend(date_matches) # Save Google results google_filename = f'li_qingshan_google_{i}.html' google_filepath = os.path.join(workspace_dir, google_filename) with open(google_filepath, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(response.text) print(f' Saved Google results to: {google_filepath}') else: print(f'‚ùå Google search failed - Status: {response.status_code}') except Exception as e: print(f'‚ùå Google search error: {str(e)}') time.sleep(2) # Longer pause for Google # Save search plan and results search_plan_file = os.path.join(workspace_dir, 'li_qingshan_investigation_search_plan.json') with open(search_plan_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump({ 'search_results': search_results, 'context_research': anti_corruption_2013_context, 'search_documentation': search_documentation, 'date_patterns': date_search_patterns, 'liu_tienan_timeline': liu_tienan_timeline, 'actual_search_results': actual_search_results }, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nüíæ COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH PLAN SAVED TO: {search_plan_file}') print('\n' + '=' * 80) print('LI QINGSHAN INVESTIGATION DATE SEARCH - EXECUTION COMPLETE') print('=' * 80) print('\nüìä SUMMARY:') print(f'‚Ä¢ Search queries prepared: {len(search_results["queries"])}') print(f'‚Ä¢ Actual web searches attempted: {len(actual_search_results)}') print(f'‚Ä¢ Date mentions found: {len(search_results["date_mentions"])}') print(f'‚Ä¢ Historical context researched: 2013 anti-corruption campaign') print(f'‚Ä¢ Timeline correlation: Liu Tienan case (May 12, 2013)') print('\nüéØ SEARCH RESULTS:') for result in actual_search_results: print(f'‚Ä¢ {result["url"]}: {result["status"]}') if result["status"] == "success": print(f' - Content: {result["content_length"]:,} chars') print(f' - Dates: {result.get("dates_found", [])}') print(f' - Keywords: {result.get("investigation_keywords", {})}') if search_results['date_mentions']: print(f'\nüìÖ DATE MENTIONS FOUND:') for date in search_results['date_mentions']: print(f'‚Ä¢ {date}') print('\nüîç NEXT STEPS:') print('1. Analyze saved HTML files for detailed Li Qingshan information') print('2. Cross-reference dates with Liu Tienan case timeline') print('3. Search Chinese government archives if needed') print('4. Verify investigation date from multiple sources') print('\n=== READY FOR DETAILED ANALYSIS PHASE ===')
Execution Output

Python Code python
import os import json import requests from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import re from datetime import datetime from collections import Counter import time print('=== LI QINGSHAN INVESTIGATION DATE SEARCH - FIXED DATA STRUCTURE ERROR ===') print('Searching for exact date when Li Qingshan was investigated by anti-corruption authorities') print('Focus: Chinese government announcements, CCDI records, news reports from 2013') print('Alternative searches: ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂèåËßÑ Êó•Êúü, ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± Á∫™ÂßîË∞ÉÊü•, Liu Tienan connection') print('=' * 80) # First, check if we have any existing files in workspace and inspect their structure workspace_dir = 'workspace' if not os.path.exists(workspace_dir): os.makedirs(workspace_dir) print(f'Created workspace directory: {workspace_dir}') # Check existing files and inspect their structure existing_files = [] if os.path.exists(workspace_dir): for filename in os.listdir(workspace_dir): if 'li_qingshan' in filename.lower() or 'liu_tienan' in filename.lower(): existing_files.append(filename) if existing_files: print(f'Found {len(existing_files)} existing related files:') for i, filename in enumerate(existing_files, 1): print(f' {i}. {filename}') # Inspect the first JSON file to understand its structure json_files = [f for f in existing_files if f.endswith('.json')] if json_files: print(f'\nüìã INSPECTING EXISTING JSON FILE STRUCTURE: {json_files[0]}') try: with open(os.path.join(workspace_dir, json_files[0]), 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: sample_data = json.load(f) print('JSON file keys:') for key in sample_data.keys(): print(f' ‚Ä¢ {key}: {type(sample_data[key])}') if isinstance(sample_data[key], list) and len(sample_data[key]) > 0: print(f' Sample item: {sample_data[key][0]}') except Exception as e: print(f'Error inspecting JSON file: {str(e)}') else: print('No existing Li Qingshan or Liu Tienan files found') # Define search queries in both Chinese and English search_queries = [ # Primary Chinese searches 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂèåËßÑ Êó•Êúü 2013', # Li Qingshan shuanggui date 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± Á∫™ÂßîË∞ÉÊü• Êó∂Èó¥', # Li Qingshan discipline commission investigation time 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂèçËÖêË¥• Ë∞ÉÊü•', # Li Qingshan anti-corruption investigation 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ‰∏≠Á∫™Âßî ÈÄöÊä•', # Li Qingshan CCDI announcement # Connection with Liu Tienan 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑ 2013', # Li Qingshan Liu Tienan 2013 'ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑ Ê°à‰ª∂ Áõ∏ÂÖ≥‰∫∫Âëò', # Liu Tienan case related personnel # English searches 'Li Qingshan investigation date 2013', 'Li Qingshan corruption China CCDI', 'Liu Tienan Li Qingshan anti-corruption 2013', # Government sources '‰∏≠Â§ÆÁ∫™Âßî ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂÖ¨Âëä', # Central Discipline Commission Li Qingshan announcement 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ËøùÁ∫™ËøùÊ≥ï Êó∂Èó¥' # Li Qingshan violation of discipline and law time ] print(f'\nüîç EXECUTING SEARCH QUERIES:') print(f'Total queries planned: {len(search_queries)}') print('-' * 60) # Initialize search results storage search_results = { 'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'target_person': 'Li Qingshan (ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±)', 'objective': 'Find exact investigation/disgrace date by anti-corruption authorities in 2013', 'queries': search_queries, 'results': [], 'date_mentions': [], 'ccdi_references': [], 'liu_tienan_connections': [] } # Simulate web search using requests (basic approach) headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36' } print('\nüì° DOCUMENTING SEARCH APPROACH:') for i, query in enumerate(search_queries[:5], 1): # Limit to first 5 queries print(f'\nQuery {i}: {query}') # Create a simple search URL (this is a basic simulation) google_search_url = f'https://www.google.com/search?q={query.replace(" ", "+")}' print(f'Search URL: {google_search_url}') search_results['results'].append({ 'query': query, 'method': 'google_search_simulation', 'url': google_search_url, 'status': 'documented for execution' }) print(f'‚úì Query documented for execution') # Research context about 2013 anti-corruption campaign (FIXED: Using .get() for safe key access) print('\n\nüìö IMPLEMENTING KNOWLEDGE-BASED RESEARCH APPROACH:') print('=' * 70) anti_corruption_2013_context = { 'campaign_start': '2012-11 (18th Party Congress)', 'key_period': '2013 (first year of Xi Jinping leadership)', 'major_cases': [ { 'name': 'Liu Tienan (ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑)', 'position': 'Vice Chairman of National Development and Reform Commission', 'investigation_announced': 'May 12, 2013', 'details': 'First high-ranking official investigated under Xi Jinping', 'connection_to_li_qingshan': 'Potential connection - both in economic planning sector' }, { 'name': 'Lei Zhengfu (Èõ∑ÊîøÂØå)', 'position': 'Chongqing District Party Secretary', # Added missing position 'investigation_announced': 'November 2012', 'details': 'Chongqing official, sex tape scandal' }, { 'name': 'Li Chuncheng (ÊùéÊò•Âüé)', 'position': 'Sichuan Vice Party Secretary', # Added missing position 'investigation_announced': 'December 2012', 'details': 'Sichuan Vice Party Secretary' } ], 'investigation_patterns': { 'announcement_timing': 'Usually announced within days of investigation start', 'ccdi_role': 'Central Commission for Discipline Inspection leads major cases', 'media_coverage': 'Xinhua News Agency typically breaks the news', 'terminology': 'shuanggui (ÂèåËßÑ) = party discipline investigation' } } print('üèõÔ∏è 2013 ANTI-CORRUPTION CAMPAIGN CONTEXT:') print(f'Campaign period: {anti_corruption_2013_context["campaign_start"]} onwards') print(f'Key investigation year: {anti_corruption_2013_context["key_period"]}') print('\nüìã MAJOR 2013 CORRUPTION CASES:') for case in anti_corruption_2013_context['major_cases']: print(f'‚Ä¢ {case["name"]} - {case.get("position", "Position not specified")}') print(f' Investigation announced: {case.get("investigation_announced", "Date not specified")}') print(f' Details: {case.get("details", "No details available")}') if 'connection_to_li_qingshan' in case: print(f' Li Qingshan connection: {case["connection_to_li_qingshan"]}') print() # Search for Li Qingshan in relation to Liu Tienan case print('üîó ANALYZING LI QINGSHAN - LIU TIENAN CONNECTION:') print('-' * 50) # Based on the Liu Tienan timeline, look for Li Qingshan investigation dates liu_tienan_timeline = { 'investigation_start': 'May 12, 2013', 'formal_charges': 'August 2013', 'trial': 'September 2013', 'sentence': 'December 2013', 'related_investigations': 'May-July 2013 period' } print('Liu Tienan case timeline:') for event, date in liu_tienan_timeline.items(): print(f' ‚Ä¢ {event}: {date}') print('\nüéØ LI QINGSHAN INVESTIGATION DATE HYPOTHESIS:') print('Based on anti-corruption campaign patterns:') print('‚Ä¢ Liu Tienan investigation announced: May 12, 2013') print('‚Ä¢ Related officials typically investigated within 1-3 months') print('‚Ä¢ Li Qingshan likely investigated: May-August 2013 period') print('‚Ä¢ Most probable timeframe: June-July 2013') # Look for specific date patterns and create targeted search approach date_search_patterns = [ # Specific months in 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥5Êúà', # Li Qingshan May 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥6Êúà', # Li Qingshan June 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥7Êúà', # Li Qingshan July 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥8Êúà', # Li Qingshan August 2013 # Specific investigation terms 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± Á´ãÊ°àË∞ÉÊü• 2013', # Li Qingshan case investigation 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂÖöÁ∫™Â§ÑÂàÜ Êó•Êúü', # Li Qingshan party discipline date 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ËøùÁ∫™ ÈÄöÊä• Êó∂Èó¥' # Li Qingshan violation report time ] print('\nüîç REFINED DATE-SPECIFIC SEARCH PATTERNS:') for i, pattern in enumerate(date_search_patterns, 1): print(f'{i}. {pattern}') search_results['queries'].append(pattern) # Now attempt actual web searches for Li Qingshan information print('\n\nüåê ATTEMPTING ACTUAL WEB SEARCHES:') print('=' * 60) # Try to search for Li Qingshan information using requests actual_search_results = [] # Search Chinese Wikipedia or Baidu Baike for Li Qingshan search_urls = [ 'https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±', 'https://baike.baidu.com/item/ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±' ] for i, url in enumerate(search_urls, 1): print(f'\nAttempting search {i}: {url}') try: response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=10) if response.status_code == 200: print(f'‚úÖ Successfully accessed {url}') # Parse the content soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') page_text = soup.get_text() # Look for investigation dates date_pattern = re.compile(r'2013Âπ¥\d{1,2}Êúà\d{1,2}Êó•|2013-\d{1,2}-\d{1,2}') dates_found = date_pattern.findall(page_text) # Look for investigation keywords investigation_keywords = ['ÂèåËßÑ', 'Ë∞ÉÊü•', 'Á∫™Âßî', 'ËøùÁ∫™', 'Â§ÑÂàÜ'] keyword_mentions = {} for keyword in investigation_keywords: count = page_text.count(keyword) if count > 0: keyword_mentions[keyword] = count actual_search_results.append({ 'url': url, 'status': 'success', 'content_length': len(page_text), 'dates_found': dates_found, 'investigation_keywords': keyword_mentions }) print(f' Content length: {len(page_text):,} characters') print(f' Dates found: {dates_found}') print(f' Investigation keywords: {keyword_mentions}') # Save the HTML content for detailed analysis filename = f'li_qingshan_search_{i}.html' filepath = os.path.join(workspace_dir, filename) with open(filepath, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(response.text) print(f' Saved to: {filepath}') else: print(f'‚ùå Failed to access {url} - Status: {response.status_code}') actual_search_results.append({ 'url': url, 'status': 'failed', 'status_code': response.status_code }) except Exception as e: print(f'‚ùå Error accessing {url}: {str(e)}') actual_search_results.append({ 'url': url, 'status': 'error', 'error': str(e) }) time.sleep(1) # Pause between requests # Try Google search for Li Qingshan print('\nüîç ATTEMPTING GOOGLE SEARCH:') google_queries = [ '"ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±" ÂèåËßÑ 2013', '"Li Qingshan" corruption investigation 2013', '"ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±" "ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑" 2013' ] for i, query in enumerate(google_queries, 1): print(f'\nGoogle search {i}: {query}') try: # Create Google search URL encoded_query = query.replace(' ', '+').replace('"', '%22') google_url = f'https://www.google.com/search?q={encoded_query}' response = requests.get(google_url, headers=headers, timeout=10) if response.status_code == 200: print(f'‚úÖ Google search successful') # Parse Google results soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') # Look for result snippets result_divs = soup.find_all('div', class_='g') print(f' Found {len(result_divs)} search results') # Extract relevant information from first few results for j, result in enumerate(result_divs[:3], 1): title_elem = result.find('h3') snippet_elem = result.find('span', class_='aCOpRe') if title_elem and snippet_elem: title = title_elem.get_text() snippet = snippet_elem.get_text() print(f' Result {j}: {title[:50]}...') print(f' Snippet: {snippet[:100]}...') # Look for dates in snippets date_matches = re.findall(r'2013Âπ¥\d{1,2}Êúà\d{1,2}Êó•|2013-\d{1,2}-\d{1,2}', snippet) if date_matches: print(f' üìÖ Dates found: {date_matches}') search_results['date_mentions'].extend(date_matches) # Save Google results google_filename = f'li_qingshan_google_{i}.html' google_filepath = os.path.join(workspace_dir, google_filename) with open(google_filepath, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(response.text) print(f' Saved Google results to: {google_filepath}') else: print(f'‚ùå Google search failed - Status: {response.status_code}') except Exception as e: print(f'‚ùå Google search error: {str(e)}') time.sleep(2) # Longer pause for Google # Analyze existing files for Li Qingshan information print('\n\nüìÅ ANALYZING EXISTING FILES FOR LI QINGSHAN INFORMATION:') print('=' * 70) if existing_files: for filename in existing_files: filepath = os.path.join(workspace_dir, filename) print(f'\nAnalyzing: {filename}') try: if filename.endswith('.json'): with open(filepath, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: file_data = json.load(f) print(f' JSON file with {len(file_data)} top-level keys') # Look for date information in JSON file_str = json.dumps(file_data, ensure_ascii=False) date_matches = re.findall(r'2013Âπ¥\d{1,2}Êúà\d{1,2}Êó•|2013-\d{1,2}-\d{1,2}', file_str) if date_matches: print(f' üìÖ Dates found in JSON: {date_matches}') search_results['date_mentions'].extend(date_matches) # Look for investigation keywords investigation_terms = ['ÂèåËßÑ', 'Ë∞ÉÊü•', 'Á∫™Âßî', 'ËøùÁ∫™', 'Â§ÑÂàÜ', 'investigation', 'corruption'] found_terms = [] for term in investigation_terms: if term in file_str: found_terms.append(term) if found_terms: print(f' üîç Investigation terms found: {found_terms}') elif filename.endswith('.html'): with open(filepath, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: html_content = f.read() soup = BeautifulSoup(html_content, 'html.parser') page_text = soup.get_text() print(f' HTML file with {len(page_text):,} characters') # Look for dates in HTML date_matches = re.findall(r'2013Âπ¥\d{1,2}Êúà\d{1,2}Êó•|2013-\d{1,2}-\d{1,2}', page_text) if date_matches: print(f' üìÖ Dates found in HTML: {date_matches}') search_results['date_mentions'].extend(date_matches) except Exception as e: print(f' ‚ùå Error analyzing {filename}: {str(e)}') # Save comprehensive search results search_plan_file = os.path.join(workspace_dir, 'li_qingshan_investigation_search_comprehensive.json') with open(search_plan_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump({ 'search_results': search_results, 'context_research': anti_corruption_2013_context, 'date_patterns': date_search_patterns, 'liu_tienan_timeline': liu_tienan_timeline, 'actual_search_results': actual_search_results, 'existing_files_analyzed': len(existing_files) }, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nüíæ COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH RESULTS SAVED TO: {search_plan_file}') print('\n' + '=' * 80) print('LI QINGSHAN INVESTIGATION DATE SEARCH - COMPREHENSIVE EXECUTION COMPLETE') print('=' * 80) print('\nüìä SUMMARY:') print(f'‚Ä¢ Search queries prepared: {len(search_results["queries"])}') print(f'‚Ä¢ Actual web searches attempted: {len(actual_search_results)}') print(f'‚Ä¢ Date mentions found: {len(search_results["date_mentions"])}') print(f'‚Ä¢ Existing files analyzed: {len(existing_files)}') print(f'‚Ä¢ Historical context researched: 2013 anti-corruption campaign') print(f'‚Ä¢ Timeline correlation: Liu Tienan case (May 12, 2013)') print('\nüéØ SEARCH RESULTS:') for result in actual_search_results: print(f'‚Ä¢ {result["url"]}: {result["status"]}') if result["status"] == "success": print(f' - Content: {result["content_length"]:,} chars') print(f' - Dates: {result.get("dates_found", [])}') print(f' - Keywords: {result.get("investigation_keywords", {})}') if search_results['date_mentions']: print(f'\nüìÖ ALL DATE MENTIONS FOUND:') unique_dates = list(set(search_results['date_mentions'])) for date in unique_dates: print(f'‚Ä¢ {date}') else: print('\n‚ùì No specific dates found in current search results') print('\nüîç NEXT STEPS:') print('1. Analyze saved HTML files for detailed Li Qingshan information') print('2. Cross-reference dates with Liu Tienan case timeline') print('3. Search Chinese government archives if needed') print('4. Verify investigation date from multiple sources') print('5. Focus on May-August 2013 timeframe based on Liu Tienan correlation') print('\n=== READY FOR DETAILED ANALYSIS PHASE ===')
Execution Output

Python Code python
import os import json import requests from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import re from datetime import datetime from collections import Counter import time print('=== LI QINGSHAN INVESTIGATION DATE SEARCH - FIXED DATA STRUCTURE ERROR ===') print('Searching for exact date when Li Qingshan was investigated by anti-corruption authorities') print('Focus: Chinese government announcements, CCDI records, news reports from 2013') print('Alternative searches: ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂèåËßÑ Êó•Êúü, ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± Á∫™ÂßîË∞ÉÊü•, Liu Tienan connection') print('=' * 80) # First, check if we have any existing files in workspace and inspect their structure workspace_dir = 'workspace' if not os.path.exists(workspace_dir): os.makedirs(workspace_dir) print(f'Created workspace directory: {workspace_dir}') # Check existing files and inspect their structure existing_files = [] if os.path.exists(workspace_dir): for filename in os.listdir(workspace_dir): if 'li_qingshan' in filename.lower() or 'liu_tienan' in filename.lower(): existing_files.append(filename) if existing_files: print(f'Found {len(existing_files)} existing related files:') for i, filename in enumerate(existing_files, 1): print(f' {i}. {filename}') # Inspect the first JSON file to understand its structure json_files = [f for f in existing_files if f.endswith('.json')] if json_files: print(f'\nüìã INSPECTING EXISTING JSON FILE STRUCTURE: {json_files[0]}') try: with open(os.path.join(workspace_dir, json_files[0]), 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: sample_data = json.load(f) print('JSON file keys:') for key in sample_data.keys(): print(f' ‚Ä¢ {key}: {type(sample_data[key])}') if isinstance(sample_data[key], list) and len(sample_data[key]) > 0: print(f' Sample item: {sample_data[key][0]}') except Exception as e: print(f'Error inspecting JSON file: {str(e)}') else: print('No existing Li Qingshan or Liu Tienan files found') # Define search queries in both Chinese and English search_queries = [ # Primary Chinese searches 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂèåËßÑ Êó•Êúü 2013', # Li Qingshan shuanggui date 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± Á∫™ÂßîË∞ÉÊü• Êó∂Èó¥', # Li Qingshan discipline commission investigation time 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂèçËÖêË¥• Ë∞ÉÊü•', # Li Qingshan anti-corruption investigation 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ‰∏≠Á∫™Âßî ÈÄöÊä•', # Li Qingshan CCDI announcement # Connection with Liu Tienan 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑ 2013', # Li Qingshan Liu Tienan 2013 'ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑ Ê°à‰ª∂ Áõ∏ÂÖ≥‰∫∫Âëò', # Liu Tienan case related personnel # English searches 'Li Qingshan investigation date 2013', 'Li Qingshan corruption China CCDI', 'Liu Tienan Li Qingshan anti-corruption 2013', # Government sources '‰∏≠Â§ÆÁ∫™Âßî ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂÖ¨Âëä', # Central Discipline Commission Li Qingshan announcement 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ËøùÁ∫™ËøùÊ≥ï Êó∂Èó¥' # Li Qingshan violation of discipline and law time ] print(f'\nüîç EXECUTING SEARCH QUERIES:') print(f'Total queries planned: {len(search_queries)}') print('-' * 60) # Initialize search results storage search_results = { 'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'target_person': 'Li Qingshan (ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±)', 'objective': 'Find exact investigation/disgrace date by anti-corruption authorities in 2013', 'queries': search_queries, 'results': [], 'date_mentions': [], 'ccdi_references': [], 'liu_tienan_connections': [] } # Simulate web search using requests (basic approach) headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36' } print('\nüì° DOCUMENTING SEARCH APPROACH:') for i, query in enumerate(search_queries[:5], 1): # Limit to first 5 queries print(f'\nQuery {i}: {query}') # Create a simple search URL (this is a basic simulation) google_search_url = f'https://www.google.com/search?q={query.replace(" ", "+")}' print(f'Search URL: {google_search_url}') search_results['results'].append({ 'query': query, 'method': 'google_search_simulation', 'url': google_search_url, 'status': 'documented for execution' }) print(f'‚úì Query documented for execution') # Research context about 2013 anti-corruption campaign (FIXED: Using .get() for safe key access) print('\n\nüìö IMPLEMENTING KNOWLEDGE-BASED RESEARCH APPROACH:') print('=' * 70) anti_corruption_2013_context = { 'campaign_start': '2012-11 (18th Party Congress)', 'key_period': '2013 (first year of Xi Jinping leadership)', 'major_cases': [ { 'name': 'Liu Tienan (ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑)', 'position': 'Vice Chairman of National Development and Reform Commission', 'investigation_announced': 'May 12, 2013', 'details': 'First high-ranking official investigated under Xi Jinping', 'connection_to_li_qingshan': 'Potential connection - both in economic planning sector' }, { 'name': 'Lei Zhengfu (Èõ∑ÊîøÂØå)', 'position': 'Chongqing District Party Secretary', # Added missing position 'investigation_announced': 'November 2012', 'details': 'Chongqing official, sex tape scandal' }, { 'name': 'Li Chuncheng (ÊùéÊò•Âüé)', 'position': 'Sichuan Vice Party Secretary', # Added missing position 'investigation_announced': 'December 2012', 'details': 'Sichuan Vice Party Secretary' } ], 'investigation_patterns': { 'announcement_timing': 'Usually announced within days of investigation start', 'ccdi_role': 'Central Commission for Discipline Inspection leads major cases', 'media_coverage': 'Xinhua News Agency typically breaks the news', 'terminology': 'shuanggui (ÂèåËßÑ) = party discipline investigation' } } print('üèõÔ∏è 2013 ANTI-CORRUPTION CAMPAIGN CONTEXT:') print(f'Campaign period: {anti_corruption_2013_context["campaign_start"]} onwards') print(f'Key investigation year: {anti_corruption_2013_context["key_period"]}') print('\nüìã MAJOR 2013 CORRUPTION CASES:') for case in anti_corruption_2013_context['major_cases']: print(f'‚Ä¢ {case["name"]} - {case.get("position", "Position not specified")}') print(f' Investigation announced: {case.get("investigation_announced", "Date not specified")}') print(f' Details: {case.get("details", "No details available")}') if 'connection_to_li_qingshan' in case: print(f' Li Qingshan connection: {case["connection_to_li_qingshan"]}') print() # Search for Li Qingshan in relation to Liu Tienan case print('üîó ANALYZING LI QINGSHAN - LIU TIENAN CONNECTION:') print('-' * 50) # Based on the Liu Tienan timeline, look for Li Qingshan investigation dates liu_tienan_timeline = { 'investigation_start': 'May 12, 2013', 'formal_charges': 'August 2013', 'trial': 'September 2013', 'sentence': 'December 2013', 'related_investigations': 'May-July 2013 period' } print('Liu Tienan case timeline:') for event, date in liu_tienan_timeline.items(): print(f' ‚Ä¢ {event}: {date}') print('\nüéØ LI QINGSHAN INVESTIGATION DATE HYPOTHESIS:') print('Based on anti-corruption campaign patterns:') print('‚Ä¢ Liu Tienan investigation announced: May 12, 2013') print('‚Ä¢ Related officials typically investigated within 1-3 months') print('‚Ä¢ Li Qingshan likely investigated: May-August 2013 period') print('‚Ä¢ Most probable timeframe: June-July 2013') # Look for specific date patterns and create targeted search approach date_search_patterns = [ # Specific months in 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥5Êúà', # Li Qingshan May 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥6Êúà', # Li Qingshan June 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥7Êúà', # Li Qingshan July 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± 2013Âπ¥8Êúà', # Li Qingshan August 2013 # Specific investigation terms 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± Á´ãÊ°àË∞ÉÊü• 2013', # Li Qingshan case investigation 2013 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ÂÖöÁ∫™Â§ÑÂàÜ Êó•Êúü', # Li Qingshan party discipline date 'ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±± ËøùÁ∫™ ÈÄöÊä• Êó∂Èó¥' # Li Qingshan violation report time ] print('\nüîç REFINED DATE-SPECIFIC SEARCH PATTERNS:') for i, pattern in enumerate(date_search_patterns, 1): print(f'{i}. {pattern}') search_results['queries'].append(pattern) # Now attempt actual web searches for Li Qingshan information print('\n\nüåê ATTEMPTING ACTUAL WEB SEARCHES:') print('=' * 60) # Try to search for Li Qingshan information using requests actual_search_results = [] # Search Chinese Wikipedia or Baidu Baike for Li Qingshan search_urls = [ 'https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±', 'https://baike.baidu.com/item/ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±' ] for i, url in enumerate(search_urls, 1): print(f'\nAttempting search {i}: {url}') try: response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=10) if response.status_code == 200: print(f'‚úÖ Successfully accessed {url}') # Parse the content soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') page_text = soup.get_text() # Look for investigation dates date_pattern = re.compile(r'2013Âπ¥\d{1,2}Êúà\d{1,2}Êó•|2013-\d{1,2}-\d{1,2}') dates_found = date_pattern.findall(page_text) # Look for investigation keywords investigation_keywords = ['ÂèåËßÑ', 'Ë∞ÉÊü•', 'Á∫™Âßî', 'ËøùÁ∫™', 'Â§ÑÂàÜ'] keyword_mentions = {} for keyword in investigation_keywords: count = page_text.count(keyword) if count > 0: keyword_mentions[keyword] = count actual_search_results.append({ 'url': url, 'status': 'success', 'content_length': len(page_text), 'dates_found': dates_found, 'investigation_keywords': keyword_mentions }) print(f' Content length: {len(page_text):,} characters') print(f' Dates found: {dates_found}') print(f' Investigation keywords: {keyword_mentions}') # Save the HTML content for detailed analysis filename = f'li_qingshan_search_{i}.html' filepath = os.path.join(workspace_dir, filename) with open(filepath, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(response.text) print(f' Saved to: {filepath}') else: print(f'‚ùå Failed to access {url} - Status: {response.status_code}') actual_search_results.append({ 'url': url, 'status': 'failed', 'status_code': response.status_code }) except Exception as e: print(f'‚ùå Error accessing {url}: {str(e)}') actual_search_results.append({ 'url': url, 'status': 'error', 'error': str(e) }) time.sleep(1) # Pause between requests # Try Google search for Li Qingshan print('\nüîç ATTEMPTING GOOGLE SEARCH:') google_queries = [ '"ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±" ÂèåËßÑ 2013', '"Li Qingshan" corruption investigation 2013', '"ÊùéÂ∫ÜÂ±±" "ÂàòÈìÅÁî∑" 2013' ] for i, query in enumerate(google_queries, 1): print(f'\nGoogle search {i}: {query}') try: # Create Google search URL encoded_query = query.replace(' ', '+').replace('"', '%22') google_url = f'https://www.google.com/search?q={encoded_query}' response = requests.get(google_url, headers=headers, timeout=10) if response.status_code == 200: print(f'‚úÖ Google search successful') # Parse Google results soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') # Look for result snippets result_divs = soup.find_all('div', class_='g') print(f' Found {len(result_divs)} search results') # Extract relevant information from first few results for j, result in enumerate(result_divs[:3], 1): title_elem = result.find('h3') snippet_elem = result.find('span', class_='aCOpRe') if title_elem and snippet_elem: title = title_elem.get_text() snippet = snippet_elem.get_text() print(f' Result {j}: {title[:50]}...') print(f' Snippet: {snippet[:100]}...') # Look for dates in snippets date_matches = re.findall(r'2013Âπ¥\d{1,2}Êúà\d{1,2}Êó•|2013-\d{1,2}-\d{1,2}', snippet) if date_matches: print(f' üìÖ Dates found: {date_matches}') search_results['date_mentions'].extend(date_matches) # Save Google results google_filename = f'li_qingshan_google_{i}.html' google_filepath = os.path.join(workspace_dir, google_filename) with open(google_filepath, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(response.text) print(f' Saved Google results to: {google_filepath}') else: print(f'‚ùå Google search failed - Status: {response.status_code}') except Exception as e: print(f'‚ùå Google search error: {str(e)}') time.sleep(2) # Longer pause for Google # Analyze existing files for Li Qingshan information print('\n\nüìÅ ANALYZING EXISTING FILES FOR LI QINGSHAN INFORMATION:') print('=' * 70) if existing_files: for filename in existing_files: filepath = os.path.join(workspace_dir, filename) print(f'\nAnalyzing: {filename}') try: if filename.endswith('.json'): with open(filepath, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: file_data = json.load(f) print(f' JSON file with {len(file_data)} top-level keys') # Look for date information in JSON file_str = json.dumps(file_data, ensure_ascii=False) date_matches = re.findall(r'2013Âπ¥\d{1,2}Êúà\d{1,2}Êó•|2013-\d{1,2}-\d{1,2}', file_str) if date_matches: print(f' üìÖ Dates found in JSON: {date_matches}') search_results['date_mentions'].extend(date_matches) # Look for investigation keywords investigation_terms = ['ÂèåËßÑ', 'Ë∞ÉÊü•', 'Á∫™Âßî', 'ËøùÁ∫™', 'Â§ÑÂàÜ', 'investigation', 'corruption'] found_terms = [] for term in investigation_terms: if term in file_str: found_terms.append(term) if found_terms: print(f' üîç Investigation terms found: {found_terms}') elif filename.endswith('.html'): with open(filepath, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: html_content = f.read() soup = BeautifulSoup(html_content, 'html.parser') page_text = soup.get_text() print(f' HTML file with {len(page_text):,} characters') # Look for dates in HTML date_matches = re.findall(r'2013Âπ¥\d{1,2}Êúà\d{1,2}Êó•|2013-\d{1,2}-\d{1,2}', page_text) if date_matches: print(f' üìÖ Dates found in HTML: {date_matches}') search_results['date_mentions'].extend(date_matches) except Exception as e: print(f' ‚ùå Error analyzing {filename}: {str(e)}') # Save comprehensive search results search_plan_file = os.path.join(workspace_dir, 'li_qingshan_investigation_search_comprehensive.json') with open(search_plan_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump({ 'search_results': search_results, 'context_research': anti_corruption_2013_context, 'date_patterns': date_search_patterns, 'liu_tienan_timeline': liu_tienan_timeline, 'actual_search_results': actual_search_results, 'existing_files_analyzed': len(existing_files) }, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nüíæ COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH RESULTS SAVED TO: {search_plan_file}') print('\n' + '=' * 80) print('LI QINGSHAN INVESTIGATION DATE SEARCH - COMPREHENSIVE EXECUTION COMPLETE') print('=' * 80) print('\nüìä SUMMARY:') print(f'‚Ä¢ Search queries prepared: {len(search_results["queries"])}') print(f'‚Ä¢ Actual web searches attempted: {len(actual_search_results)}') print(f'‚Ä¢ Date mentions found: {len(search_results["date_mentions"])}') print(f'‚Ä¢ Existing files analyzed: {len(existing_files)}') print(f'‚Ä¢ Historical context researched: 2013 anti-corruption campaign') print(f'‚Ä¢ Timeline correlation: Liu Tienan case (May 12, 2013)') print('\nüéØ SEARCH RESULTS:') for result in actual_search_results: print(f'‚Ä¢ {result["url"]}: {result["status"]}') if result["status"] == "success": print(f' - Content: {result["content_length"]:,} chars') print(f' - Dates: {result.get("dates_found", [])}') print(f' - Keywords: {result.get("investigation_keywords", {})}') if search_results['date_mentions']: print(f'\nüìÖ ALL DATE MENTIONS FOUND:') unique_dates = list(set(search_results['date_mentions'])) for date in unique_dates: print(f'‚Ä¢ {date}') else: print('\n‚ùì No specific dates found in current search results') print('\nüîç NEXT STEPS:') print('1. Analyze saved HTML files for detailed Li Qingshan information') print('2. Cross-reference dates with Liu Tienan case timeline') print('3. Search Chinese government archives if needed') print('4. Verify investigation date from multiple sources') print('5. Focus on May-August 2013 timeframe based on Liu Tienan correlation') print('\n=== READY FOR DETAILED ANALYSIS PHASE ===')
Execution Output
